ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlo Barberi,Mark Henry,H. M. Baker,Carlo Barberi,Mark Henry,H. M. Baker
ComicInfo.Summary: Ghost embarks on a one-woman crusade to end a gang war that threatens to tear apart Arcadia, in "The Woes of Sinful Bachelors." Manga fans will want to check out chapter 2 of "Burglar Girls", an affectionate send-up of the Japanese comics and anime we all know and love. And in "Dark Exorcism," the masked witch-priestess Shabrken takes on an entire village of demons. Superheroes, satire, and sorcery all in one cool package!
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: Trouble X2; Dark Exorcism Part 1; The Woes of Sinful Bachelors Part One
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric Luke,Mark Henry,Philip D. Amara,Phil Amara,Welles Hartley,Phil Amara,Mark Henry,Welles Hartley,Eric Luke
